text: Oleksandr Kozak (; born 25 July 1994 in Kyiv, Ukraine) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for Inhulets Petrove. ==Career== Kozak is a product of different youth team systems. In 2014, he signed a contract with FC Metalurh Donetsk. He made his debut for FC Metalurh Donetsk in a game against FC Hoverla Uzhhorod on 23 May 2015 in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==References == ==External links== *Profile at FFU Official Site (Ukr) * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Kyiv Category:Piddubny Olympic College alumni Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Obolon-2 Kyiv players Category:FC Metalurh Donetsk players Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Stal Kamianske players Category:FC Mariupol players Category:FC Illichivets-2 Mariupol players Category:FC Inhulets Petrove players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukrainian First League players
title: Oleksandr Kozak
